Title: Race 3
Writer: Shiraz Ahmed (story and screenplay), Shiraz Ahmed (dialogue), Kiran Kotrial (dialogue), Ali Jacko (I Found Love)
Actors: Anil Kapoor, Salman Khan, Bobby Deol, Jacqueline Fernandez
Plot: Relationships and loyalties of a criminal family planning its next big heist are tested when some shocking revelations strike them.
